name: Ghost Borkers
description:
Tonight, Scrappy the dog makes the spooker the spookee!

Bark fear into the stopped hearts of the undead to prevent these cowardly ghouls from escaping. Help Scrappy the Fearless scare the ghosts into their crypt located in the center of the map by using his terrifying bark, sending the ghosts running in the opposite direction of our furry hero.

Developed By: Event Horizon Interactive

Ryan Branson: Programmer, Voice acting

Raymond Barringer: Sound, Programmer

Rachel Campbell: Art

Jeremy Martin: Art
